## Installation

You can install the development version of unijob from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("TengMCing/unijob")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(unijob)
## basic example code
```

```{r}
monash() |>
  head()
```

```{r}
unimelb() |>
  head()
```

```{r}
unsw() |>
  head()
```
